person.persName: William G. Stone (Woodford County, KY, law student)

body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky, law student. Kentucky native. Married to Belle Railey Stone in Woodford County, Kentucky, on May 21, 1861. Father of William Stone and Hadley Stone. Attended Harvard Law School in Cambridge, Massachusetts, in 1859. Attended school in Woodford County in 1850. Law student in Woodford County in 1860.
